typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_transaction_key as string,
		dim_claim_handler_key as string,
		guarantee_amount_org as decimal(28,10),
		dim_transaction_type_key as string,
		dim_claim_type_key as string,
		inc_status_at_trans_date as string,
		map_date as date,
		dim_coverage_key as string,
		dim_claim_category as string,
		dim_broker as string,
		created_date as date,
		last_updated_by as string,
		dim_underwriter_key as string,
		dim_agreement_type_key as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		created_by as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		guarantee_amount_stat as decimal(28,10),
		dim_currency_key as string,
		deleted_ind as string,
		guarantee_amount_usd as decimal(28,10),
		dim_sub_claim as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		dim_client_key as string,
		dim_claim_trans_date as long,
		dim_business_area_key as string,
		dim_incident_key as string,
		dim_risk_object_key as string,
		dim_country_key as string,
		dim_source_system_key as string,
		dim_vessel_type_3ltr as string,
		dim_guarantee as string,
		dim_agreement_key as string,
		dim_capital_branch as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from \ndwh_prepare.pre_fact_guarantee_trans\nwhere map_date IS NULL',
	format: 'query') ~> preFactGuaranteeTrans
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from marts.dim_claim_handler',
	format: 'query') ~> dimClaimHandler
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from marts.dim_transaction_type',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
